data.title: Tote Bag of Therese Saxe-Hildburg
data.meta_description: Tote Bag of THERESE SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN Wife of Ludwig I, King of Bavaria
data.text:
Canvas Tote Bag

Our tote bags are made from soft, durable, poly-poplin fabric and include a one inch (2.5cm) black strap for easy carrying on your shoulder. All seams are double-stitched for added durability. Each tote bag is machine-washable in cold water and is printed on both sides using the same image. Approximate size of bag is 50x33cm (20"x13")

Our tote bags are made from soft durable fabric and include a strap for easy carrying

Estimated Product Size is 32.7cm x 50cm (12.9" x 19.7")

These are individually made so all sizes are approximate

SECURE PAYMENTS

We happily accept a wide range of payment options so you can pay for the things you need in the way that is most convenient for you

MADE IN THE UK

Safe Shipping with 30 Day Money Back Guarantee

FREE PERSONALISATION

We are proud to offer a range of customisation including Cropping, Captions, and Filters. Zoom Cropping can be adjusted in the Basket.

EDITORS COMMENTS

This stunning print captures the regal beauty of Therese Saxe-Hildburghausen, the wife of Ludwig I, King of Bavaria. Therese was known for her grace and elegance, as well as her unwavering support for her husband during his reign. The intricate details in this portrait showcase the luxurious attire and elaborate jewelry that were characteristic of royalty during the 19th century. Therese's legacy as a devoted wife and influential figure in German history is evident in this image. Her marriage to Ludwig I not only solidified political alliances but also brought about cultural advancements in Bavaria. As queen consort, she played a significant role in promoting education, arts, and social welfare programs throughout the kingdom. The artist behind this masterpiece has expertly captured Therese's dignified presence and refined demeanor. Every brushstroke highlights her poise and sophistication, making it easy to see why she was revered by both nobility and commoners alike. This print from Mary Evans Picture Library serves as a timeless reminder of Therese Saxe-Hildburghausen's enduring impact on Bavarian history. It is a testament to her strength, intelligence, and unwavering dedication to her husband and country.
